General case
=============

Here we find some User case of General :

For index (homepage)
----------------------

What happens when we try to access the homepage and it succeeds ? :

.. automethod:: oc_lettings_site.tests.test_views.OcLettingsSiteViewsTest.test_index_view

For Sentry test trigger Exception
----------------------------------

What happens when we try to run the Sentry trigger function ? :

.. automethod:: oc_lettings_site.tests.test_views.OcLettingsSiteViewsTest.test_trigger_error_view
